column4: hello guys, I need some advice. I'm a web developer and I'm totally foreign to LINUX
I'm considering switching and starting on linux. but I'm unsure if it's better for me on ubuntu than on windows
do you recommend ubuntu/kubuntu over windows?
well, will it do me any good
I am a web develop
developer
I don't play games
but I need some image manipulation programs that are windows-only
for your desktop?
and I'm not sure if all programs are also for ubuntu
or laptop?
for my laptop
no vestel
Windows has drivers for your laptop, Ubuntu most likely not.
you can try a live cd however to see whether everything works.
I have all drivers fasta
I'll try that.
xenaxon,?
can you give me a link to download the latest version of kubuntu
how can you know you have all the drivers?
I have the drivers on CD
I think you got a driver CD from your vendor containing _Windows_ drivers...
you are probably too clueless to use Ubuntu Linux on a laptop.
but good luck.
